title: 3 and Out - Wild Card Rundown: Dak Limitations, Hurts Painful, Bills Blast Bill, Joey B Montana Vibes
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Wild Card Rundown: Dak Limitations, Hurts Painful, Bills Blast Bill, Joey B Montana Vibes
description:
John reacts to the Wild Card weekend action, including if the Cowboys are making a mistake by sticking with Mike McCarthy for another year, if Philly should move on from Jalen Hurts, how Josh Allen has transformed the Bills franchise, and why Joe Burrow has some Joe Montana "It".

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
